body_html: @aselle Do you mean to say that the C++ interface can now compute gradients and add them to the graph as in python? I don't see anything in the C interface to access this functionality. Is there a separate ticket to track that? Is there any rough timeline on when this functionality is expected?

body: @aselle Do you mean to say that the C++ interface can now compute gradients and add them to the graph as in python? I don't see anything in the C interface to access this functionality. Is there a separate ticket to track that? Is there any rough timeline on when this functionality is expected?
